channel.title: Dead Rising 2: Case West
channel.description:
[url='https://kotaku.com/5638549/frank-west-returns-in-new-dead-rising-title']Frank West returns in Dead Rising 2 Epilogue - Kotaku[/url]
"Capcom tonight showed off another new game in the Dead Rising series: Dead Rising: Case West.
Serving as an "epilogue" to the latest game, it will star both Dead Rising 2's Chuck Greene and Dead Rising's Frank West. Which explains that photo of the two together.
Case West will be a downloadable title, similar to the recent Case Zero, and will be exclusive to the Xbox 360. As you'd expect/hope for, it'll also feature co-op play, one man playing as Chuck, one as Frank."
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yic04GdHWmc']Dead Rising 2 Case West 2010 Debut Trailer - YouTube[/url]

item.title: Dead Rising 2: Case West
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Odds that the dialogue will include statements regarding the coverage of wars?

High probably. I can see it now, Frank shoots a zombie Chuck replies “Hey where did you learn to shoot like that” Frank would reply “I’ve covered wars ya know”.

item.title: Dead Rising 2: Case West
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Dead Rising 2 isn’t out yet, but it seems like that trailer has spoiled the ending.

I’m sure for most people the story is an after thought though. Since, you know, slaughtering zombies with crazy weapons doesn’t need a story.

item.title: Dead Rising 2: Case West
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Frank West returns in Dead Rising 2 Epilogue - Kotaku

"Capcom tonight showed off another new game in the Dead Rising series: Dead Rising: Case West.

Serving as an “epilogue” to the latest game, it will star both Dead Rising 2’s Chuck Greene and Dead Rising’s Frank West. Which explains that photo of the two together.

Case West will be a downloadable title, similar to the recent Case Zero, and will be exclusive to the Xbox 360. As you’d expect/hope for, it’ll also feature co-op play, one man playing as Chuck, one as Frank."

Dead Rising 2 Case West 2010 Debut Trailer - YouTube
